member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Design.SqlServerHierarchyIdDesignTimeServices
member.summary: Enables configuring design-time services. Tools will automatically discover implementations of this interface that are in the startup assembly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Design.SqlServerHierarchyIdDesignTimeServices.ConfigureDesignTimeServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Configures design-time services. Use this method to override the default design-time services with your own implementations.

member.name: T:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.Properties.Resources.ServicesMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UseHierarchyId requires AddEntityFrameworkSqlServerHierarchyId to be called on the internal service provider used..

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServerHierarchyIdDbContextOptionsBuilderExtensions.UseHierarchyId(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Infrastructure.SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder)
member.param: The builder being used to configure SQL Server.
member.returns: The options builder so that further configuration can be chained.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.SqlServerHierarchyIdServiceCollectionExtensions.AddEntityFrameworkSqlServerHierarchyId(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Adds the services required for HierarchyId support in the SQL Server provider for Entity Framework.
member.returns: The same service collection so that multiple calls can be chained.
